price: 78. Tika ete epambolama nkombo ya Nkolo nayo oyo atonda lokumu mpe boboto.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
